label: 吉田勘兵衛
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1611-86).  Land developer.  The funding provided by Yoshida Kambei for the reclamation of a portion of Edo Bay was one of the earliest examples of the merchants' participation in large-scale land development (p. 500).
